amendment.description: To include a provision relating to transfers from the Upper Colorado River Basin Fund.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3042 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3042 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Hatch to Amendment SA 2910. (consideration: CR S4333; text: CR S4334) To include a provision relating to transfers from the Upper Colorado River Basin Fund.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3042 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3042 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Hatch to Amendment SA 2910.
